summary: The customer was looking for help with their billing for Contoso Wireless and the agent explained the streaming service offered, which is available for $9.99 per month or $99.99 for a one-year subscription. The agent also informed the customer of the discounts available when signing up for multiple subscriptions and the 30-day free trial that can be accessed through the website or app. Finally, the agent confirmed that all streaming services are ad-free and include unlimited access to content, as well as premium channels that can be added on for an additional fee.
